complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Project Structure for 2D/3D Lottery Betting
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks for setting up navigation, creating placeholder screens, configuring project architecture, and implementing shared widgets.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves a moderate level of complexity because it requires implementing foundational navigation and UI components, aligning with architectural guidelines, and setting up placeholders.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Data Models for Lottery Betting
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into extending existing models, creating betting formula models, implementing sales period logic, adding numeral support, and ensuring validation rules.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is complex due to the need to design multiple models, handle diverse numeral formats, and implement validation logic while ensuring compatibility with existing architecture.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Number Input and Validation System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split the task into implementing input fields, creating parsers, building validation logic, and integrating real-time error messages.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is moderately complex because it involves handling diverse input formats, ensuring real-time feedback, and supporting multiple numeral systems.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break the task into implementing individual formulas, designing a factory pattern, testing formula outputs, optimizing performance, and documenting logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is highly complex due to the need for a robust calculation engine supporting multiple formula types and ensuring correctness and scalability.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Segment the task into implementing individual 3D formulas, optimizing for large datasets, enabling pagination, testing outputs, and documenting edge cases.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The complexity is high because of the advanced permutations involved, performance optimization needs, and handling large result sets.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate Wallet System with Betting Functionality
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into integrating wallet APIs, implementing balance checks, creating transaction logic, handling errors, and testing the integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is complex because it involves secure API integration, real-time updates, and ensuring atomicity in financial transactions.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Countdown Timer and Sales Period Management
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into creating timers, implementing deadline logic, building connection handling, and testing updates.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The task involves medium complexity due to the need for real-time synchronization, deadline enforcement, and offline handling features.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Betting Submission and API Integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split the task into integrating submission APIs, implementing validation, adding retry logic, creating confirmation screens, and testing edge cases.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is highly complex because it requires end-to-end handling of betting submissions, robust validation, and retry mechanisms for failed submissions.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into implementing paste detection, creating parsers, validating content, and adding feedback mechanisms.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The complexity arises from the need to parse and validate multi-line inputs while ensuring usability and clear error reporting.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Hot Numbers and Betting History Features
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break the task into integrating APIs, creating displays, implementing history filters, and adding caching mechanisms.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task has a moderate complexity level due to the integration of APIs and the need to implement user-friendly data presentation.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Statistical Analysis and Visualization of Lottery Results
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Segment the task into data processing, pattern recognition, visualization design, performance optimization, and documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is highly complex because it involves advanced data analytics, visualization, and performance considerations for processing large datasets.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Favorites and Saved Bet Combinations Feature

complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task has moderate complexity due to the need for robust data management, user-friendly organization options, and cross-device synchronization.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Social Sharing Functionality for Winning Bets and Results
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into designing sharable content, integrating sharing APIs, adding privacy controls, and implementing analytics tracking.
